descriptionHtml:
Is Solitude you favourite city? Is Proudspire Manor your favorite home? Is smithing your favorite skill? Then rejoice because this mod will make it possible to smith from withing your very own Proudspire Manor! 

This mod adds an extra room to Proudspire Manor containging everything for all your smithing needs!
The grindstone and workbench are located to your left upon entering the manor through the cellar door. The smelter, anvil and tanning rack are on the right. For the sake of immersion i havn’t tried to make this room as huge as possible so don’t expect something as epic as the skyforge. It still has to fit inside Proudspire Manor after all.

Features:
-Anvil
-Smelter
-Tanning rack
-Workbench
-Grindstone
-Storage for your crafting materials (the chest is set to NON-RESPAWN)
-Extra weapon racks
-Dagger display cases
-More mannequins

Installation:
-Download with NMM and activate

Manual installation (not recommended):
-Extract file
-Place the esp in the ...\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data folder

Steam Workshop:
For those of you who insist on using the workshop here is the link:
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=8957

Load Order:
-Load this mod somewhere near the top for instance where you load other house mods


Future Plans:
This mod is considered final but if you have any tips or suggestions please let me know and i might add it to this mod.


Uninstallation:
-Deactivate using NMM
-When using the manual installation remove the Proudspire Crafting.esp from your data folder
!!Make sure to empty the chest if you don\'t want your items to disappear!!

Incompatibility:
This will probably conflict with other mods that modify Proudspire Manor. 

*Thanks for downloading, hope you enjoy the mod*
author: MrK44s

files.name: Proudspire Crafting
files.changelogHtml: Added Chimney, Fixed dagger case flickering
